price: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmani! Idan kun taimaki Allah, zai taimake ku, kuma Ya tabbatar da dugãduganku..*
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ
footnotes: * Tabbatar da dugadugan ƙafãfun, yanã nufin sanya musu jãrumta a cikin zukãtansu, dõmin ƙafãfunsu, su kafu a wurin yaƙi, dõmin kada su gudu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
